snippet: Chancellor Angela Merkel of Germany criticized an assistant secretary of state’s undiplomatic comment on European efforts to resolve the political crisis in Ukraine.
abstract: Tensions between United States and European Union over leaked recordings of disparaging comments made by diplomats on both sides are a reflection of disarray that has marked much of the West's dealings with Ukraine; US and Europe have had different aims for the country since it became independent as the Soviet Union crumbled.

byline.contributor: Peter Baker contributed reporting from Washington.

lead_paragraph: Chancellor Angela Merkel of Germany criticized an assistant secretary of state’s undiplomatic comment on European efforts to resolve the political crisis in Ukraine.

headline.main: Leaked Recordings Lay Bare E.U. and U.S. Divisions in Goals for Ukraine
headline.print_headline: Leaked Recordings Lay Bare E.U. and U.S. Divisions in Goals for Ukraine

keywords.value: Wiretapping and Other Eavesdropping Devices and Methods
keywords.name: subject
